verses.verse: Paul, <S%G3972><s%> an apostle <S%G652><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> by the commandment <S%G2003><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> our Savior, <S%G4990><s%> and Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is our hope; <S%G1680><s%>

To Timothy, <S%G5095><s%> my own <S%G1103><s%> son <S%G5043><s%> in the faith: <S%G4102><s%> Grace, <S%G5485><s%> mercy, <S%G1656><s%> and peace, <S%G1515><s%> from God <S%G2316><s%> our Father <S%G3962><s%> and Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> our Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

As I sought <S%G3870><s%> you to abide <S%G4357><s%> still <S%G4357><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Ephesus, <S%G2181><s%> when I went <S%G4198><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Macedonia, <S%G3109><s%> that you might charge <S%G3853><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> that they teach <S%G2085><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> other <S%G2085><s%> doctrine,

Neither <S%G3366><s%> give heed <S%G4337><s%> to fables <S%G3454><s%> and endless <S%G562><s%> genealogies, <S%G1076><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> minister <S%G3930><s%> questions, <S%G2214><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> godly <S%G2316><s%> edifying <S%G3618><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in faith: <S%G4102><s%> so do.

Now <S%G1161><s%> the end <S%G5056><s%> of the commandment <S%G3852><s%> is charity <S%G26><s%> out of a pure <S%G2513><s%> heart, <S%G2588><s%> and of a good <S%G18><s%> conscience, <S%G4893><s%> and of faith <S%G4102><s%> unfeigned: <S%G505><s%>
From which <S%G3739><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> having swerved <S%G795><s%> have turned <S%G1624><s%> aside <S%G1624><s%> to vain <S%G3150><s%> jangling; <S%G3150><s%>

Desiring <S%G2309><s%> to be teachers <S%G3547><s%> of the law; <S%G3547><s%> understanding <S%G4920><s%> neither <S%G3383><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> they say, <S%G3004><s%> nor <S%G3383><s%> whereof <S%G4012><s%> <S%G5101><s%> they affirm. <S%G1226><s%>
But we know <S%G1492><s%> that the law <S%G3551><s%> is good, <S%G2570><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> use <S%G5530><s%> it lawfully; <S%G3545><s%>

Knowing <S%G1492><s%> this, <S%G5124><s%> that the law <S%G3551><s%> is not made <S%G2749><s%> for a righteous <S%G1342><s%> man, but for the lawless <S%G459><s%> and disobedient, <S%G506><s%> for the ungodly <S%G765><s%> and for sinners, <S%G268><s%> for unholy <S%G462><s%> and profane, <S%G952><s%> for murderers <S%G3964><s%> of fathers <S%G3964><s%> and murderers <S%G3389><s%> of mothers, <S%G3389><s%> for murderers, <S%G409><s%>

For fornicators, <S%G4205><s%> for them that defile <S%G733><s%> themselves with mankind, <S%G733><s%> for enslavers, <S%G405><s%> for liars, <S%G5583><s%> for perjured <S%G1965><s%> persons, <S%G678><s%> and if <S%G1487><s%> there be any <S%G1536><s%> other <S%G2087><s%> thing that is contrary <S%G480><s%> to sound <S%G5198><s%> doctrine; <S%G1319><s%>
According <S%G2596><s%> to the glorious <S%G1391><s%> gospel <S%G2098><s%> of the blessed <S%G3107><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> was committed <S%G4100><s%> to my trust. <S%G4100><s%>

And I thank <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5485><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> our Lord, <S%G2962><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> has enabled <S%G1743><s%> me, for that he counted <S%G2233><s%> me faithful, <S%G4103><s%> putting <S%G5087><s%> me into <S%G1519><s%> the ministry; <S%G1248><s%>

Who <S%G3588><s%> was before <S%G4386><s%> a blasphemer, <S%G989><s%> and a persecutor, <S%G1376><s%> and injurious: <S%G5197><s%> but I obtained <S%G1653><s%> mercy, <S%G1653><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> I did it ignorantly <S%G50><s%> in unbelief. <S%G570><s%>

And the grace <S%G5485><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> was exceeding <S%G5250><s%> abundant <S%G5250><s%> with faith <S%G4102><s%> and love <S%G26><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

This <S%G3588><s%> is a faithful <S%G4103><s%> saying, <S%G3056><s%> and worthy <S%G514><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> acceptation, <S%G594><s%> that Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> to save <S%G4982><s%> sinners; <S%G268><s%> of whom <S%G3739><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> chief. <S%G4413><s%>

However, <S%G235><s%> for this <S%G5124><s%> cause <S%G1223><s%> I obtained <S%G1653><s%> mercy, <S%G1653><s%> that in me first <S%G4413><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> might show <S%G1731><s%> forth <S%G1731><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> long-suffering, <S%G3115><s%> for a pattern <S%G5296><s%> to them which should <S%G3195><s%> hereafter <S%G3195><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> him to life <S%G2222><s%> everlasting. <S%G166><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> to the King <S%G935><s%> eternal, <S%G165><s%> immortal, <S%G862><s%> invisible, <S%G517><s%> the only <S%G3441><s%> wise <S%G4680><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> be honor <S%G5092><s%> and glory <S%G1391><s%> for ever <S%G165><s%> and ever. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

This <S%G5026><s%> charge <S%G3852><s%> I commit <S%G3908><s%> to you, son <S%G5043><s%> Timothy, <S%G5095><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the prophecies <S%G4394><s%> which went <S%G4254><s%> before <S%G4254><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> you, that you by them might war <S%G4754><s%> a good <S%G2570><s%> warfare; <S%G4752><s%>

Holding <S%G2192><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> and a good <S%G18><s%> conscience; <S%G4893><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> having put <S%G683><s%> away <S%G683><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> have made <S%G3489><s%> shipwreck: <S%G3489><s%>

Of whom <S%G3739><s%> is Hymenaeus <S%G5211><s%> and Alexander; <S%G223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I have delivered <S%G3860><s%> to Satan, <S%G4567><s%> that they may learn <S%G3811><s%> not to blaspheme. <S%G987><s%>
